Screenwriter: Andy Tennant, Susannah Grant, Rick Parks
Distributor: 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, 20th Century Fox, Buena Vista Pictures
Synopsis: This updated adaptation of the classic fairytale tells the story of Danielle (Drew Barrymore), a vibrant young woman who is forced into servitude after the death of her father. Danielle's stepmother Rodmilla (Anjelica Huston) is a heartless woman who forces Danielle to do the cooking and cleaning, while she tries to marry off her own two daughters. But Danielle's life takes a wonderful turn when she meets the charming Prince Henry (Dougray Scott).
Title: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
